articles.author: April Glover
articles.title: Bruce Willis' battle with aphasia has been 'hard' for his wife Emma Heming Willis - 9Honey Celebrity
articles.content:
Bruce Willis' declining health has been tough on his wife of 12 years, Emma Heming Willis.
The 43-year-old model, who married the Die Hard star in 2009, is reportedly struggling with seeing the love… [+2176 chars]

articles.title: Scientists finally reveal the first complete human genome - Lifestyle Asia India
articles.description: A team from the Telomere-to-Telomere (T2T) Consortium, comprising 100 scientists, has succeeded in sequencing the complete human genome.
articles.content: Nineteen years ago, the groundbreaking Human Genome Project study sequenced 92 percent of the human genome. However, scientists had been struggling to decipher the remaining eight percent. Now, a tea… [+2104 chars]

articles.title: Razzies rescind satirical award poking fun at Bruce Willis following his health disclosure - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The actor was nominated eight times for the special category "Worst Performance by Bruce Willis in a 2021 Movie". His family announced earlier this week that he had been diagnosed with aphasia and was retiring.
articles.content: The Razzies on Thursday (Mar 31) rescinded the satirical award they had created poking fun at Bruce Willis for his body of work in 2021 after his family announced he was retiring from acting due to t… [+1729 chars]

articles.title: Police offered to arrest Will Smith, Oscars producer says - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The authorities did not take any action because Chris Rock declined to press charges.
articles.content: Los Angeles police were on site and ready to arrest actor Will Smith at the Academy Awards last Sunday (Mar 27) for slapping presenter Chris Rock, the producer of the Hollywood ceremony said on Thurs… [+1605 chars]

articles.title: Yishun 5-cent kopi saga: Coffee shop denies patron's claim that her 'kopi-o was poured away' - AsiaOne
